div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.8.2.1
CodeDisplay
1340pTX: Cannot be assessed
1341pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
1342pT1: Tumor 2 cm or less in greatest dimension without extraparenchymal extension
1343pT2: Tumor more than 2 cm but not more than 4 cm in greatest dimension without extraparenchymal extension
1344pT3: Tumor more than 4 cm and/or tumor having extraparenchymal extension
1345pT4a: Moderately advanced disease. Tumor invades skin, mandible, ear canal, and/or facial nerve.
1346pT4b: Very advanced local disease. Tumor invades skull base and/or pterygoid plates and/or encases carotid artery

publisher.value: Agence du Numérique en Santé(ANS) -2 - 10 Rue d'Oradour-sur-Glane, 75015 Paris

display.value: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
pT1: Tumor 2 cm or less in greatest dimension without extraparenchymal extension
pT2: Tumor more than 2 cm but not more than 4 cm in greatest dimension without extraparenchymal extension
pT3: Tumor more than 4 cm and/or tumor having extraparenchymal extension
pT4a: Moderately advanced disease. Tumor invades skin, mandible, ear canal, and/or facial nerve.
pT4b: Very advanced local disease. Tumor invades skull base and/or pterygoid plates and/or encases carotid artery
